column2: "Hmm, just a bit further... ...ah, hello, good day. Thanks for your business!"
"I've been conducting research into boosting the effects of certain drinks, but I've come across a bit of a snag."
"That's where you come in. I need you to find me ingredients for my latest project, Shifta Drink Z! "
"I won't take no for an answer, so let's just say you said yes, all right? So good, it's settled, then!"
"Well, I'm counting on you. With the right ingredients, I could whip up a batch in no time!"
